ValidationRule.description: If DC is 'Additional Domain Name' or 'webfront', enter per DC & per website If DC is 'StoreFront APIs for other channels' or 'Distance selling checkout', enter per DC If DC is 'Digital Commerce', enter per independently managed number
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND ( TEXT(Digital_Commerce_Options__c) ='Additional Domain Name' || TEXT(Digital_Commerce_Options__c) ='Webfront', ISBLANK( Per_DC_Implementation__c ), ISBLANK( Per_Website__c ) ), AND( TEXT(Digital_Commerce_Options__c) ='StoreFront APIs For Other Channels' || TEXT(Digital_Commerce_Options__c) ='Distance Selling Checkout', ISBLANK( Per_DC_Implementation__c ) ), AND( TEXT(Digital_Commerce_Options__c) ='Digital Commerce', ISBLANK( Per_Independently_Managed_Brand__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If DC Option is 'Additional Domain Name'/'Webfront', enter per DC & per website If DC Option is 'StoreFront APIs for other channels'/'Distance selling checkout', enter per DC If DC Option is 'Digital Commerce', enter per independently managed brand
